text: Castlegar is a Canadian city in British Columbia, Canada. Castlegar is in the West Kootenay region in British Columbia. There were 8,338 people in Castlegar at the 2021 census. Castlegar is the second largest place in the West Kootenay region. ==Other websites== *City of Castlegar's Official website Category:1946 establishments in Canada Category:Cities in British Columbia
title: Castlegar, British Columbia
